review: The Fire TV Stick makes it so easy for me to access the content on Amazon Prime. Before, I found that I was not watching much of the content that I get with my Prime Membership because I had no easy way to get to it. The Fire TV Stick makes it so simple. The interface is simple and the app makes it trivial to find what I am looking for. I am watching a lot more Amazon content and getting more value out of my Prime membership. I highly recommend this product. Well done!

review: I have a Chromecast so I was hesitant to buy another streaming stick. I'm glad I did because the Fire TV Stick is so much better. I no longer have to always have my phone available to play something. In addition, if you have a little bit of tech skills you can install almost any android APK on the Fire Stick, making it much more versatile.
